selected_quotes: It is good to see you have caught on to using 'soft' but tough systems to get things done. -Starfish
OPEN ACCESS: Soft Robotic Grippers Non-Destructively Manipulate Deep Sea Coral Reef Organisms
Softer robotic hands to collect marine samples
Soft Robotic grippers for biological sampling on deep #CoralReefs: #SoftRobotics @AMNH

citation.abstract: This article presents the development of an underwater gripper that utilizes soft robotics technology to delicately manipulate and sample fragile species on the deep reef. Existing solutions for deep sea robotic manipulation have historically been driven by the oil industry, resulting in destructive interactions with undersea life. Soft material robotics relies on compliant materials that are inherently impedance matched to natural environments and to soft or fragile organisms. We demonstrate design principles for soft robot end effectors, bench-top characterization of their grasping performance, and conclude by describing in situ testing at mesophotic depths. The result is the first use of soft robotics in the deep sea for the nondestructive sampling of benthic fauna.
citation.title: Soft Robotic Grippers for Biological Sampling on Deep Reefs

news.title: 软体夹具——机器人抓取技术的未来
news.summary: 技术机器人夹具 RoboTimes · 2016-03-06 18:29 点击上方“RoboTimes”可以订阅关注 精选最前沿资讯，拥抱机器人大时代 在机器人技术中，除了其本体和控制系统之外，还有一项重要而极具想象力的东西，那就是夹具。 早在上世纪末，各大科研机构就展开对机器人夹具的深度研究。其中以机械夹具和吸盘最为成功，它们目前也被广泛应用于各大工业自动化领域。 这样的： 或是这样的： 这种僵硬的夹具有一个很大限制，就是要求被抓取物品的形态规则、一致。 今天要给大家带来的，是来自哈佛大学及洛桑…
